title: Careers at GEC Barmer
description: Join our team and be part of an institution committed to excellence in education and research

positions.title: Assistant Professor - Computer Science
qualifications: Ph.D. in Computer Science or related field

positions.title: Technical Staff - Electronics Lab
qualifications: Minimum 2 years experience in lab management

general.question: What is the typical hiring process?
general.answer: The hiring process typically includes application screening, written test (if applicable), presentation/interview, and final selection by the committee.

general.question: How long does the recruitment process take?
general.answer: The recruitment process usually takes 4-6 weeks from the application deadline to the final offer.

faculty.question: What is the teaching load?
faculty.answer: Faculty members typically teach 3-4 courses per semester, including undergraduate and postgraduate courses.

faculty.question: Are there opportunities for research funding?
faculty.answer: Yes, faculty members can apply for research grants and receive support for research initiatives.

benefits.question: What benefits are provided?
benefits.answer: Benefits include competitive salary, health insurance, housing facilities, professional development opportunities, and research support.

benefits.question: Is there a probation period?
benefits.answer: Yes, there is a probation period of one year for new faculty members.
